mapper.insert:
insert into pro_out_sou
companyName,
tradeId,
otherTrade,
post,
proCount,
speciality,
`describe`,
createTime,
startDate,
endDate,
contactName,
phone,
openId,
state
values
#{companyName},
#{tradeId},
#{otherTrade},
#{post},
#{proCount},
#{speciality},
#{describe},
now(),
#{startDate},
#{endDate},
#{contactName},
#{phone},
#{openId},
1
mapper.select:
select count(*) from pro_out_sou where 1=1
and contactName like CONCAT('%',#{contactName},'%')
and phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
and area like CONCAT('%',#{area},'%')
and companyName like CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%')
and enginName like CONCAT('%',#{enginName},'%')
and tradeName like CONCAT('%',#{tradeName},'%')
and otherTrade like CONCAT('%',#{otherTrade},'%')
and specialityName like CONCAT('%',#{specialityName},'%')
and otherSpeciality like CONCAT('%',#{otherSpeciality},'%')
and createTime between #{createTimeStart} and #{createTimeEnd}
and startDate between #{startDateStart} and #{startDateEnd}
and endDate between #{endDateStart} and #{endDateEnd}
and state=#{state}
select * from pro_out_sou where openId=#{openId} order by createTime desc
